# Semantic conventions for NFS metrics

**Status**: [Development][DocumentStatus]

This document describes instruments and attributes for NFS and NFSD metrics. 

<!-- toc -->

<!-- tocstop -->

## NFS metrics

### Metric: `nfs.client.net.count`

This metric is [recommended][MetricRecommended].

<!-- semconv metric.nfs.client.net.count -->
<!-- NOTE: THIS TEXT IS AUTOGENERATED. DO NOT EDIT BY HAND. -->
<!-- see templates/registry/markdown/snippet.md.j2 -->
<!-- prettier-ignore-start -->
<!-- markdownlint-capture -->
<!-- markdownlint-disable -->

| Name     | Instrument Type | Unit (UCUM) | Description    | Stability | Entity Associations |
| -------- | --------------- | ----------- | -------------- | --------- | ------ |
| `nfs.client.net.count` | Counter | `{request}` | Reports the count of kernel NFS client network requests handled [1] | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) | `host` |

**[1]:** Linux: this metric is taken from the Linux kernel's svc_stat.netcnt, which includes both UDP datagrams and TCP segments

<!-- markdownlint-restore -->
<!-- prettier-ignore-end -->
<!-- END AUTOGENERATED TEXT -->
<!-- endsemconv -->

### Metric: `nfs.client.net.tcp.connection.count`

| Name     | Instrument Type | Unit (UCUM) | Description    | Stability | Entity Associations |
| -------- | --------------- | ----------- | -------------- | --------- | ------ |
| `nfs.client.net.tcp.connection.count` | Counter | `{connection}` | Reports the count of kernel NFS client TCP connections accepted [1] | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) | `host` |

**[1]:** Linux: this metric is taken from the Linux kernel's svc_stat.nettcpconn

### Metric: `nfs.client.operation.count`

This metric is [recommended][MetricRecommended].

<!-- semconv metric.nfs.client.operation.count -->
<!-- NOTE: THIS TEXT IS AUTOGENERATED. DO NOT EDIT BY HAND. -->
<!-- see templates/registry/markdown/snippet.md.j2 -->
<!-- prettier-ignore-start -->
<!-- markdownlint-capture -->
<!-- markdownlint-disable -->

| Name     | Instrument Type | Unit (UCUM) | Description    | Stability | Entity Associations |
| -------- | --------------- | ----------- | -------------- | --------- | ------ |
| `nfs.client.operation.count` | Counter | `{procedure}` | Reports the count of kernel NFSv4+ client operations | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) | `host` |

| Attribute  | Type | Description  | Examples  | [Requirement Level](https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/general/attribute-requirement-level/) | Stability |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| [`rpc.nfs.operation.name`](/docs/registry/attributes/rpc.md) | string | NFSv4+ operation name | `OPEN`; `READ`; `GETATTR` | `Recommended` | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) |
| [`rpc.onc.version`](/docs/registry/attributes/rpc.md) | int | ONC/Sun RPC program version |  | `Recommended` | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) |

<!-- markdownlint-restore -->
<!-- prettier-ignore-end -->
<!-- END AUTOGENERATED TEXT -->
<!-- endsemconv -->
